Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Mysterium scholars need more samples for study.

Kill {@LinkCreature:28#1011#blackhoof unicorns}, {@LinkCreature:28#1021#thorny timberwolves}, {@LinkCreature:28#1031#tumbling sporewalkers}, and {@LinkCreature:28#1041#corrupted mycanars}.

Report to Coordinator Sarvasia when mission is complete.
You’ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven’t completed your mission yet.
